name: Shovon
title: Web Developer & Engineer
location: Chittagong University of Engineering & Technology (CUET), Bangladesh
bio: I specialize in building exceptional digital experiences while pursuing my studies in Water Resources Engineering. With a background in web development, machine learning, and ethical hacking, I bring a unique perspective that combines environmental engineering with cutting-edge technology.
longBio: I'm a developer, engineer, and lifelong learner currently focused on developing innovative solutions for environmental challenges while building accessible, human-centered products that solve real-world problems. My approach combines technical expertise with environmental consciousness and a deep understanding of user needs.
